errorResponses.phrase: HTTP Status 400 is returned if you send invalid JSON.

HTTP Status 401 (Not authorized) is returned if you fail to do one of the following: Provide a valid access token in the query string: ?access_token=token=ACCESS_TOKEN |Â Provide a valid access token as an x-token HTTP header
The resource could not be found.
There was a specific problem with the data you sent. More information is included in the response.
All endpoints can also return HTTP Status 500 (Internal server error) if there is a problem on the server.
